name: Slow-Cooked Saucy Pot Roast
description: Cook once, eat for days! You’ll be a meal prep champion with this saucy, melt-in-your-mouth pot roast full of aromatic herbs and spices. Simply serve with Steamer Mashed Potatoes and side salad, or use leftovers to beef up the protein in chili, soup, sandwiches, and salads. Enjoy Pot Roast Pasta tomorrow!

ingredients.name: Bruschetta Seasoning or Sun-Kissed Tomato Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Peel and slice carrots. Chop celery. Drain and rinse tomatoes.
  2. To slow cooker, add carrots, celery, mushrooms, and tomato paste. Add tomatoes and, using your hands, gently break them up. Stir in seasonings and sugar.
  3. Season beef with salt and pepper and add to slow cooker. Spoon liquid in slow cooker overtop.
  4. Cover and cook 6 hr on high or 10 hr on low, until beef is fork-tender.
  5. Thickly slice beef and serve with sauce from slow cooker.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mashed potatoes and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp prepared Epicure Dressing.
